alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Marshall; Union (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 14 at 11:09AM CST until December 16 at 6:30AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Little Tallahatchie Canal at Etta near New Albany For the Little Tallahatchie River...including Etta near New Albany... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Tallahatchie Canal at Etta near New Albany. * WHEN...From this morning to Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 28.0 feet, cropland flooding is very extensive and water begins to cover County Road 46. County Road 47 has 1 to 2 feet of water over the unpaved portions. Evacuations become necessary due to access problems. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 23.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 27.5 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
